movie.title: At Eternity's Gate
movie.plot: A look at the life of painter Vincent van Gogh during the time he lived in Arles and Auvers-sur-Oise, France.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 15 nominations.

events.title: Richard Jewell finds a bomb at the 1996 Olympics

movie.title: Richard Jewell
movie.plot: American security guard Richard Jewell saves many lives from an exploding bomb at the 1996 Olympics, but is vilified by journalists and the press who falsely reported that he was a terrorist.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.
